utils.data_utils package¶

Submodules¶

utils.data_utils.data_handler module¶

utils.data_utils.data_handler.convert_to_one_hot(labels)¶

Converts the integer label to one hot representation

Parameters:labels – The integer label
Returns:One hot representation of the integer label
utils.data_utils.data_handler.create_experiment(expt_name)¶

Creates a directory for this experiment where all the logs and outputs are saved. The directory is named after the experiment-name suffixed with a 4-digit random number.

Parameters:expt_name – Experiment name.
Returns:None
utils.data_utils.data_handler.fetch_data(tasks)¶

Fetches the dataset from the Database and then divides it into training / testing / validation data

Parameters:task_ids – Dictionary of task identifiers-loss type pairs indexed by task-id.
Returns:split data, and labels

utils.data_utils.labels module¶

class utils.data_utils.labels.Labels(labels)¶

Bases: object

Given a list of features, assigns each an ID starting at zero.

get(label)¶
Returns:The ID associated with a label, or None if there is not one.
